Articles.Content:
This is driving me crazy. I've undocked from my lab. Now I can't seem to reignite my engine. I think it's a staging problem. Is there any way to make it active again?

Hay the picture thing seems to have worked. See, I'm trainable.

Lee

Just so I'm clear, nothing happens on throttleup?

If not, what happens when you right click on the engine?

found problem. In my earlier attempts to transfer fuel I'd clicked on the green arrow. The Oxidizer was turned off. Right clicking on it said flame out. Problem fixed.

Lee
